content: Michelle Malkin is a jenny. She doesn't like Pelosi, that's OK. But what 'rights' is Pelosi supposed to be giving 'illegals' have that US citizens don't have? One of the beauties of America is its system of constitutional law that covers all 'men' in America, whether they are citizens, or not. When it comes to 'rights', there is, constitutionally, no two-tier system. Change that and you've got the United States of Bulgaria, Cote Ivoire or even Cuba

Its like welfare recipients who roll around in escalades, not enough people to investigate their actions. Its madness.....but at the end of the day immigrants are not responsible for a single damn thing wrong with America..... It just boggles my mind how anyone seriously blames people with no education for every and any problem here in the states....Its crazy. Besides being here illegally I think many of us object to the diversion of social and economic resources to the illegals. There is a strong perception that the illegals are getting a free ride on everything from education to health care while those footing the bill are heading towards bankruptcy.

content: Michelle Malkin is a jenny. She doesn't like Pelosi, that's OK. But what 'rights' is Pelosi supposed to be giving 'illegals' have that US citizens don't have? One of the beauties of America is its system of constitutional law that covers all 'men' in America, whether they are citizens, or not. When it comes to 'rights', there is, constitutionally, no two-tier system. Change that and you've got the United States of Bulgaria, Cote Ivoire or even Cuba

quote: Originally posted by carsleyt: quote: Originally posted by popsiq: Michelle Malkin is a jenny. She doesn't like Pelosi, that's OK. But what 'rights' is Pelosi supposed to be giving 'illegals' have that US citizens don't have? One of the beauties of America is its system of constitutional law that covers all 'men' in America, whether they are citizens, or not. When it comes to 'rights', there is, constitutionally, no two-tier system. Change that and you've got the United States of Bulgaria, Cote Ivoire or even Cuba Maybe that Illegals are exempt from following laws of the land as we are? First crime, coming across the border ilegally, second crime, ID theft when putting a social securtiy number on an application.....what would happen to you for doing that? Would you be able to use the arguement that you are just trying to make a better life for yourself? But hey, if you have no problem with illegal immigration cool. Hope ya never get in the way of MS13 or any of the cartels basd in many major US cities. Or a daughter, grand daughter. Ya know like Chandra Levy........
reply: Carl, He doesnt live here and is not a Citizen he just comes here to stir. I think we should ship all illegals to Canada so they can show us how its done. And Yes, they commit crimes that a citizen or legal alien couldnt get away with. As Peloser said "They are special people'

content: quote: Originally posted by Irwin_R_Schyster: quote: Originally posted by L0A1: quote: Originally posted by Irwin_R_Schyster: quote: Originally posted by BAGodbehere: quote: Irwin_R_Schyster New Member Posted Thu 19 March 2009 09:31 AM Hide Post Immigrants are no more a threat to the US than Jewish Immigrants were to Nazi Germany... Shall we start to quote Mein Kampf?? People with your viewpoint should bear the brunt of the cost of Illegals, lets have one go take YOUR job and whatever money you have in savings should go to paying their medical bills, no problem right? Bet you really don't think that way Irrrrwin when it's you that has to bear the burden. Don't give us that; you don't mind paying either, I don't beleive it. Buck up son and break open that wallet of yours and let us know which illegal you gave your job to. Wow...if an immigrant from a third world country stole your job.. LOL....maybe YOU should go to Mexico... I just love it when people say that...."A dumb immigrant stole my job."....lol No one has ever proved immigrants have "stolen" any OPPORTUNITY from American citizens...and they never will. The fact they are here ILLEGALLY is the Problem. No one here has anything against immigrants. So? We do not have the resources to enforce that law. Its like welfare recipients who roll around in escalades, not enough people to investigate their actions. Its madness.....but at the end of the day immigrants are not responsible for a single damn thing wrong with America..... It just boggles my mind how anyone seriously blames people with no education for every and any problem here in the states....Its crazy. Besides being here illegally I think many of us object to the diversion of social and economic resources to the illegals. There is a strong perception that the illegals are getting a free ride on everything from education to health care while those footing the bill are heading towards bankruptcy.
